OOC: There really is no way that Uproar could have gotten here to this
cham=
ber or even any way near it.

He would have had to have some how had to hav=
e found Magmatron's base,
made it through it without getting caught, and th=
en out through the
other door, which has been closed since Tuscon and Big C=
onvoy came
through it - that last door that transpoerted them to the interi=
or of
this volcano, - and then fight his way through the magma and such to
=
get to her.

I appreciate the effort Sandy but please trust me, I have not
=
forgotten about Nightlight and I don't kill off characters without
approval=
 of the player . . . or at least not without several warning
first! >:-)

B=
ut it does make for some DRAMA doesn't it?

I would imagine Tuscon might be=
 noticing this right about now or at
least soon after that she has not made=
 it out. ;-)

The bad part is - - - there is no way back in (. . . cue the =
tense music)

I should be posting tommorrow.

The darkness of the night is =
passing, prepare for THE FIERY DAWN!!!!!!

-- Preston
